item.title: Testing the Screenshot Script
item.description: This guide explains how to run and extend the tests for the screenshot.py script.

item.title: Deep Neuron Lab GmbH
item.description: Deep Neuron Lab is Germany's leading specialist in AI-based analysis of financial and non-financial reports, leveraging advanced machine learning technologies to transform complex financial data into accessible, actionable insights for the financial industry.

item.title: FP Digital Business Solutions
item.description: FP Digital Business Solutions provides digital transformation services and solutions focused on document processing, secure communications, and business process automation.

item.title: OCR History
item.description: A Comprehensive Historical Analysis of OCR Technology Development

item.title: Konfuzio
item.description: Konfuzio is a Document AI platform that enables businesses to extract, classify, and process information from documents automatically.

item.title: Tiny IDP
item.description: Tiny IDP is a modern, LLM-powered document data extraction API that converts documents into structured JSON data in seconds.

item.title: AIIM (Association for Intelligent Information Management)
item.description: AIIM is a global non-profit organization that provides education, research, and certification programs to information professionals. While not a traditional IDP vendor, AIIM plays a crucial role in the IDP ecosystem by providing standards, best practices, and professional development for intelligent information management.

item.title: Amagno
item.description: Amagno is a German enterprise content management (ECM) and document management system (DMS) provider that offers intelligent document processing capabilities with a focus on digital document workflows and automation.

item.title: Apache PDFBox
item.description: Apache PDFBox is an open-source Java library for working with PDF documents. While not a traditional IDP vendor, it provides essential functionality for PDF manipulation and text extraction that serves as a foundation for many document processing solutions.

item.title: Astera
item.description: Astera is a data management software company that provides data integration, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load), and document processing solutions. Their products help organizations automate data flows and extract valuable information from various document types.

item.title: Attri.AI
item.description: Attri.AI is an AI-powered agent platform that leverages artificial intelligence to automate document processing and workflows. The company focuses on providing autonomous AI agents that can understand, process, and act on information from various document sources.

item.title: Automation Hero (Liquidated)
item.description: Automation Hero is an intelligent document processing and automation platform that combines AI-powered document processing with end-to-end process automation capabilities.

item.title: Axis AI
item.description: Axis AI provides intelligent document processing solutions that leverage artificial intelligence to automate data extraction and document processing workflows.

item.title: Base64.ai
item.description: Base64.ai provides advanced document AI solutions for automated data extraction from documents, IDs, and forms using artificial intelligence.

item.title: Box
item.description: Box is a leading cloud content management platform that enables organizations to securely manage, share, and collaborate on their content from anywhere, on any device, while maintaining enterprise-grade security and compliance.

item.title: BuildSimple
item.description: BuildSimple provides low-code/no-code intelligent document processing and workflow automation solutions designed to simplify complex business processes.

item.title: Caylent
item.description: Caylent is a cloud solutions provider that offers document processing capabilities as part of its broader portfolio of cloud-native technologies and services.

item.title: Chartpixel
item.description: Chartpixel is an innovative data visualization platform that transforms complex data into interactive, engaging charts and graphs, making it easier for businesses to communicate insights and make data-driven decisions.

item.title: Checkbox
item.description: Checkbox is a no-code workflow automation platform that enables organizations to digitize and automate document-driven processes without programming.

item.title: Cloudmersive
item.description: Cloudmersive provides a comprehensive suite of APIs for document processing, conversion, validation, and data extraction across multiple formats and use cases.
